items.summary: Remove the last 3 static photos from the Gallery page (frontend/src/pages/Gallery.tsx). The static photos are currently hardcoded as gallery-photo-01.jpeg through gallery-photo-30.jpeg. Remove gallery-photo-28.jpeg, gallery-photo-29.jpeg, and gallery-photo-30.jpeg from the hardcoded static photos array, so that only gallery-photo-01.jpeg through gallery-photo-27.jpeg remain displayed in the photo gallery section.
